Dipolisikan Fahira soal Meme Joker, Ade Armando: yang Dilakukan Anies Jahat
02 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Pakar komunikasi Ade Armando heran dipolisikan Anggota DPD Fahira Idris soal unggahan meme Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan yang diedit berwajah seperti Joker. Baginya, unggahan tersebut merupakan kritikan terhadap Anies karena munculnya anggaran aneh di DKI.
"Anies Baswedan memang harus dikecam secara terbuka akibat anggaran Aica Aibon dan bolpen yang tidak masuk di akal. Itu merupakan penghamburan yang rakyat yang luar biasa. Menurut saya, apa yang dilakukannya jahat," ucap Ade kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Ade mengatakan, meme yang diunggah bukan hasil karyanya. Tapi ia mengunggah meme tersebut atas kesadaran penuh.
"Meme itu sendiri bukan buatan saya. Tapi saya secara sadar menyebarkannya karena isinya memang sesuai dengan apa yang ingin saya sampaikan pada Anies dan pada publik," kata Ade.

Polished by Fahira about the Joker Meme, Ade Armando: the Evil Anies
02 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Communication expert Ade Armando was surprised that DPD member Fahira Idris questioned about the upload of DKI Governor Anies Baswedan's meme which was edited with a face like a Joker. For him, the upload was a criticism of Anies because of the strange budget appearance in DKI.
"Anies Baswedan must be openly criticized for Aica Aibon's budget and the absurd ballpoint pen. That is an extraordinary scattering of the people. In my opinion, what he did was evil," Ade told reporters on Friday (11/01/2019) ).
Ade said the meme uploaded was not the result of his work. But he uploaded the meme in full awareness.
"The meme itself is not made by me. But I consciously spread it because the contents are in accordance with what I want to convey to Anies and the public," Ade said.
